titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8309

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 28 Feb 1862.

Hon: Nat Gaither Jr
Sec: of State-
The following changes have been orderd & entries made accordingly in this office- please make the necessary changes in your Office viz:

Sam T. Moore 2d Lieut: has resigned (Com: dated 18 Nov 1861)- Charles R. Cotton ^captain^ has resigned (Com: dated 16 Decr 1861). Flamen Ball Jr Captain has resigned (Com: dated 25 Jan 1862) Thomas Murrell 2d Lieut: has resigned (Com: dated 13 Novr 1861) George W. Dasher 1st Lieut: has been promoted (date of Com: 25th Jan 1862) John W. Wallace 1st Lieut: & James Laurie 2. Lieut (Com: dated 18th Decr 1861) both are changed to 23d September 1861_ and Benjamin F. Stevenson Assistant Surgeon has resigned (date of Com: 16 Decr 1861)-
I send the following Commissions for record- viz:

Benjamin A. Thompson Captain date 23 February 1862 #1
George W. Dasher Captain- date 22 February 1862 #2
Jesse McDaniel 2d Lieut. date 18 February 1862 #3
Thomas H. Carson Do #4
Alonso M. Morrison Assistant Surgeon- date 11 February 1862 #5

Very Resply
John Finnell
Adjt Genl
